query:
CREATE TABLE `department_budgets` (
  `id` varchar(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  `department` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `year` int NOT NULL,
  `quarter` int,
  `month` int,
  `allocated_budget` decimal(15,2) NOT NULL,
  `currency` varchar(3) DEFAULT 'IDR',
  `notes` text,
  `created_by` int NOT NULL,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `idx_department_year` (`department`, `year`),
  INDEX `idx_year_quarter` (`year`, `quarter`),
  INDEX `idx_year_month` (`year`, `month`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user Y8fKT2LsvR8QMXV.893c95ef4fb6 --database CpEi2h5S6ugwixFhxmPzAJ --execute CREATE TABLE `department_budgets` (
  `id` varchar(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  `department` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `year` int NOT NULL,
  `quarter` int,
  `month` int,
  `allocated_budget` decimal(15,2) NOT NULL,
  `currency` varchar(3) DEFAULT 'IDR',
  `notes` text,
  `created_by` int NOT NULL,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `idx_department_year` (`department`, `year`),
  INDEX `idx_year_quarter` (`year`, `quarter`),
  INDEX `idx_year_month` (`year`, `month`)
);
